BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Communication from the Mayor  - "AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, chapter 130 of the laws of 1998 and chapter 406 of the laws of 1999, both amending the general municipal law relating to temporary investments by local governments, in relation to such investments". S.3814/A.7301
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Amend General Muncipal Law relating to temporary investments by local governments (S.3814/A.7301)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Spano, S.4471, and Assembly Member Vitaliano, A.8414, "AN ACT to permit certain employees at the city of New York and the board of education of the city of New York to withdraw from the twenty-five year early retirement program".
Items.MatterName: Withdraw from the twenty-five year early retirement program (S.4471, A.8414)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Johnson, S.3254, and Assembly Member Sweeney, A.6496, "AN ACT in relation to reclassifying the retirement from the New York city police pension fund for ordinary disability of DeForest Taylor as a retirement for accident disability".
Items.MatterName: Reclassifying the retirement from the New York city police pension fund (S.3254, A.6496)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Spano, S.4468, and Committee on Rules, A.8415, "AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to the application of the age fifty-seven retirement program, the mandated physically taxing program and the incumbent fifty-five/twenty-five program for certain employees".
Items.MatterName: Age fifty-seven retirement program, the mandated physically taxing program and the incumbent fifty-five/twenty-five program for certain employees (S.4468, A.8415)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Maltese, S.1541, and Assembly Member Seminerio, A.2472, "AN ACT to amend chapter 609 of the laws of 1996, allowing correction members of the New York city employees' retirement system to elect the benefits provided by chapter 936 of the laws of 1990, or chapter 631 of the laws of 1993, in relation to extending the time for such elections".
Items.MatterName: Amend chapter 609 of the laws of 1996, extending time for such elections (S.1541, A.2472)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Maltese, S.1538, and Assembly Member Seminerio, A.2467, "AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to service credit for correction members of the New York city employees' retirement system".
Items.MatterName: Service credit, correction members of the NYCERS (S.1538, A.2467)

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor  - "AN ACT in relation to authorizing the city of New York to lease certain parkland, commonly known as Steeplechase Park, with improvements thereon, in the borough of Brooklyn to Brooklyn Baseball Company, LLC or its successors or assignees (BBC) in connection with the construction, operation and maintenance of a stadium, related facilities, and concession facilities for use as the home stadium of a professional minor league baseball team and for other uses". S.3761-A/A.8865
Items.MatterName: Lease parkland known as Steeplechase Park (S.3761-A, A.8865)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Leibell, S.4942, and by Committee on Rules A.8440, "AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to provisional appointments".
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Maltese, S.1538, and Assembly Member Seminerio, A.2467, "AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to service credit for correction members of the New York city employees' retirement system".
Items.MatterName: Service credit, correction members of the NYCERS (S.1538, A.2467)
